org.fluentjdbc.DbContextBulkInsertBuilder

Packages that use DbContextBulkInsertBuilder
Package
Description
org.fluentjdbc
Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

  • Uses of DbContextBulkInsertBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

    Creates a DbContextBulkInsertBuilder object to fluently generate a INSERT ... statement for a list of objects.

    Adds a function that will be called for each object to get the value for PreparedStatement.setObject(int, Object) for each row in the bulk insert
